src:
UFC 244 Review & UFC Moscow Preview - Care/Don’t Care Podcast
04 Nov 2019, 20:00 by June M. Williams



It’s time for another of our infamous and patented Care/Don’t Care Podcasts, with your talent: the astounding Eugene S. Robinson of ozy.com and author of “Fight: Everything You Wanted to Know About Ass-Kicking but Were Afraid You’d Get Your Ass Kicked for Asking” and host of the ‘Ozy Confidential Podcast’, the indubitable John S. Nash, our chief financials columnist and co-host of our ‘Show Money Podcast’, along with our lovely co-host, Stephie Haynes, of Bloody Elbow’s The Level Change Podcast and The Mookie & Crookie Show.
The format of the show is to review the prior weeks picks & then to announce each fight on the upcoming card, commenting on which fights are hot and which fights are not, as well as introducing an off-topic discussion point or two when there’s time. This week’s topics are as follows:
UFC 244 REVIEW - 1:08
Related UFC 244 - Masvidal vs. Diaz - The 6th Round SBN MMA Post-Fight Show by Bloody Elbow Presents
IT’S NOT TOO LATE TO Watch ‘UFC 244 - ‘MASVIDAL VS DIAZ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! GET THE FIGHTS!
Here’s a look at the UFC 244 RESULTS & new fight records:

UFC 244 MAIN CARD | SATURDAY NOV. 2 - 10PM/7PM ETPT


52:03 - 170 lbs - Jorge Masvidal (35-13) DEF. Nate Diaz (20-12) - KO/TKO- DR Stoppage (eye cut) at 5:00 Rd 3 of 5, Total 15:00
47:27 - 185 lbs - Darren Till (18-2) DEF. Kelvin Gastelum (16-5) - DEC-Unanimous
42:41 - 170 lbs - Stephen Thompson (15-4) DEF. Vicente Luque (17-7) - DEC-Unanimous
38:58 - 265 lbs - Derrick Lewis (22-7) DEF. Blagoy Ivanov (18-3) - DEC-Split
34:46 - 205 lbs - Kevin Lee (18-5) DEF. Gregor Gillespie (13-1) - KO/TKO-Overhand Right to Head Kick at 2:47 of Rd 1

FIGHT OF THE NIGHT: ($50K ea.) Stephen Thompson vs. Vicente LuquePERFORMANCES OF THE NIGHT: ($50K ea.) Kevin Lee, Corey AndersonATTENDANCE: 20,143 - SelloutGATE: $6,575,996.19 (2nd highest at MSG behind 205)
ESPN2 PRELIMS | 8PM/5PM ETPT17:25 - 205 lbs - Corey Anderson (13-4) DEF. Johnny Walker (17-4) - KO/TKO-Punches at 2:07 of Rd 115:27 - 145 lbs - Shane Burgos (13-1) DEF. Makwan Amirkhani (15-4) - KO/TKO-Punches at 4:32 of Rd 3, Total 14:3212:18 - 185 lbs - Edmen Shahbazyan (11-0) DEF. Brad Tavares (17-6) - KO/TKO-Left Head Kick at 2:27 of Rd 1 10:06 - 265 lbs - Jairzinho Rozenstruik (9-0) DEF. Andrei Arlovski (28-19) - KO/TKO-Counter Left Hook at 0:19 of Rd 1
FIGHTPASS/ESPN+ EARLY PRELIMS | 6:30PM/3:30PM ETPT4:51 - 125 lbs - Katlyn Chookagian (13-2) DEF. Jennifer Maia (17-6) - DEC-Unanimous4:22 - 170 lbs - Lyman Good (21-5) DEF. Chance Rencountre (14-4) - KO/TKO-Right Cross to G & P at 2:03 of Rd 3, Total 12:033:38 - 145 lbs - Hakeem Dawodu (11-1) DEF. Julio Arce (16-4) - DEC-Split

UFC MOSCOW PREVIEW - 1:03:22
At this point in the show we offer you our ‘disclaimer’ and then our trio go about predicting UFC Moscow’s entire bout sheet, leading their way up to the Co-Main showcasing Heavyweights Alexander Volkov vs. Greg Hardy, and wrapping up the C/DC quick-picks preview portion of the show with a Main Event featuring a Featherweight Bout between Zabit Magomedsharipov and Calvin Kattar. The event will be taking place this Saturday, November 9th, 2019, from the CSKA Arena in Moscow, Russia.
Watch ‘UFC ON ESPN + 21 - ‘MAGOMEDSHARIPOV VS KATTAR ’ Stream all the fights broadcast LIVE — don’t miss a single second of face-punching action! Plus, you get access to the best of the UFC Archives & more! SIGN UP NOW!
UFC on ESPN+ 21 - MOSCOW MAIN CARD | SATURDAY NOV. 9 - 2PM/11AM ETPT145 lbs - Zabit Magomedsharipov (17-1) vs. Calvin Kattar (20-3) - 1:13:53265 lbs - Alexander Volkov (30-7) vs. Greg Hardy (5-1) - 1:12:13170 lbs - Zelim Imadaev (8-1) vs. Danny Roberts (16-5) - 1:10:41205 lbs - Ed Herman (23-14) vs. Khadis Ibragimov (8-1) - 1:10:03185 lbs - Shamil Gamzatov (13-0) vs. Klidson Abreu (15-3) - 1:09:11170 lbs - Anthony Rocco Martin (16-5) vs. Ramazan Emeev (18-3) - 1:08:06
ESPN+ PRELIMS | 11AM/8AM ETPT205 lbs - Magomed Ankalaev (11-1) vs. Dalcha Lungiambula (10-1) - 1:06:36155 lbs - Rustam Khabilov (23-4) vs. Sergey Khandozhko (37-5) - 1:06:11185 lbs - Roman Kopylov (8-0) vs. Karl Roberson (8-2) - 1:05:43135 lbs - Grigorli Popov (14-3) vs. Davey Grant (8-4) - 1:05:28170 lbs - Abubakar Nurmagomedov (15-2) vs. David Zawada (16-5) - 1:04:39155 lbs - Alexander Yakovlev (25-9) vs. Roosevelt Roberts (8-1) - 1:04:20135 lbs - Jessica-Rose Clark (9-5) vs. Pannie Kianzad (11-5) - 1:04:08
Be sure to follow Eugene on twitter @EugeneSRobinson and on The Show Stomper!, John at @heynottheface and on The Show Money Podcast, and of course Stephie can also be followed @CrooklynMMA, and twice a week on @MookieNCrookie, AND @LevelChangePod.
Related UFC 244 Review & UFC Moscow Preview - Care/Don’t Care Podcast
If you enjoyed our show, give us a shout out in the comments here on Bloody Elbow, or give us a “like”, share & subscribe over on one of our other BE Presents Channels: SoundCloud, YouTube, iTunes & Apple TV, iHeartRadio, Stitcher, Spotify, Google Play, TuneIn, OverCast, or Player FM – whichever one happens to be your listening platform of choice. While you’re there, don’t forget to subscribe to Bloody Elbow Presents; that way you’ll always be the first to get all of BE’s daily MMA offerings. For previous episodes of the show, check out our playlists on all of our BE Presents channels.
In This Stream

UFC 244: Masvidal vs. Diaz live results, play-by-play, analysis, highlights, more



Dan Hardy issues lengthy apology to Walker for taunting claims


UFC 244 Review & UFC Moscow Preview - Care/Don’t Care Podcast


MMA SQUARED: After tie-ins and branding, how’d Diaz and Masvidal review UFC 244?
